item.title: FPR-researcher of the week
item.description: FRANCESCO CONTI Who is Francesco Conti? Francesco Conti is currently a Junior Assistant Professor (RTD-A) in the DEI department of the University of Bologna. Previously, has been a postdoctoral researcher at the Integrated Systems Laboratory His main works were into heterogeneous multicore architectures, in particular for energy-efficient and low-power embedded systems. Educational Qualification: He completed his Bachelor’s and Master’s in Electronics Engineering from University of Bologna at Italy ‚Åç Also as a part of his Master’s he had been to Delft University of Technology - Netherlands on an Erasmus exchange program Projects:
